== Definition ==
A [[chord]] made up of three notes such that the [[interval]] between two of them are thirds

== Types & Construction ==

* Let <math>X \in \mathbb{W}</math>, the triads are the following sets
** Major Triad (X/XÎ”)<math display="block">X^\Delta = C\left(X,\{ 0, 4, 7 \right\})</math>
*** P1 M3 P5
** Minor Triad (Xm/Xmin)<math display="block">X \text{min} = C(X,\left\{ 0, 3, 7 \right\})</math>
*** P1 m3 P5
** Augmented Triad (X+/Xaug)<math display="block">X{+} = C(X, \left\{ 0, 4, 8 \right\} )</math>
*** P1 M3 A5
** Diminished Triad (X<sup>o</sup>/Xdim)<math display="block">X^\circ = C(X, \left\{ 0, 3, 6 \right\})</math>
*** P1 m3 D5
